description.en-us: Hot Wheels Atomix were micro-sized versions of regular Hot Wheels that were produced between 2002 and 2005 . They were similar to the earlier Planet Micro series. In 2003 they also appeared to be included in some 2003 Mainlines . The line was created by Tara Toys. After the Atomix series, Hot Wheels did not venture into micro cars until the Worlds Smallest Hot Wheels series in 2017 .
